card_text: Target 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" you control; if that monster you control battles an opponent's monster this turn, apply these effects until the end of the Damage Step.$N●It gains 1000 ATK.$N●Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects.$N●If it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.$N●Any battle damage your opponent takes from that battle is doubled.
